display_long_description:
# Hexball is a fast-paced multiplayer VR arena game where up to 3 players face off in skill-based battles.

Easy to jump into, tough to master. Every match is packed with wild plays, clutch saves, and nonstop action.

Volley, block, and rebound your way through quick matches that feel awesome whether you’re dominating or just goofing off with friends.

# Play. Flex. Win.

[media]
Take the competition to the next level with **Premier League** club arenas, kits, and collectibles. Customize your Hexball Arena, represent your favorite team, and dominate the opposition.

[media]

It’s your chance to prove your skills and claim the crown in the ultimate VR Arena showdown!

[media]

# Big fun. Big moments. Welcome to the future of VR Sports.
